title: Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design 9th txtbk + solutions
description:
Shigley's Mechanical Engineering Design, 9th Edition (c2011), textbook + solutions manual by Richard G. Budynas and J. Keith Nisbett.
(mixed units: US & SI)

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073529281/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0073529281/index.html</a>
(see Errata)

NOTE: Solutions to ch. 5, 18 and 19 are missing. Problem statements and solutions for ch. 5 were extracted from the previous (8th) edition and inserted here as best substitute available. No solutions are available for ch. 18 and 19.

CONTENTS:
---------
PART 1 - BASICS
 1. Introduction to Mechanical Engineering Design
 2. Materials
 3. Load and Stress Analysis
 4. Deflection and Stiffness
PART 2 - FAILURE PREVENTION
 5. Failures Resulting from Static Loading
 6. Fatigue Failure Resulting from Variable Loading
PART 3 - DESIGN OF MECHANICAL ELEMENTS
 7. Shafts and Shaft Components
 8. Screws, Fasteners, and the Design of Nonpermanent Joints
 9. Welding, Bonding, and the Design of Permanent Joints
 10. Mechanical Springs
 11. Rolling-Contact Bearings
 12. Lubrication and Journal Bearings
 13. Gears - General
 14. Spur and Helical Gears
 15. Bevel and Worm Gears
 16. Clutches, Brakes, Couplings, and Flywheels
 17. Flexible Mechanical Elements
 18. Power Transmission Case Study
PART 4 - ANALYSIS TOOLS
 19. Finite-Element Analysis
 20. Statistical Considerations
Appendixes:
A Useful Tables
B Answers to Selected Problems

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (22 + 10 MB).
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.
